text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, we're in trouble!
Time is running out…!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
You see, some consider it a problem
that your horse girl has not won
a single race so far…!
color_text_info_list: not won a single race so far

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
If you can't provide her a first victory
by September, your contract may be
terminated!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
September is right around the corner!
Please, obtain that win!
